body:
Comment 2: 
Yes, gdb seems not to be very happy with our binaries recently.  I have seen crashes
like this even on Linux.  If you delete the file $GOROOT/src/pkg/runtime/runtime-gdb.py
then the Go-specific extensions will not be loaded, and gdb might be happier.  I
definitely tried that when I saw the Linux crash but I don't remember if it worked.

Marking this as nice for Go 1 but not a must.
_Labels changed: added **priority-go1**, removed **priority-triage**._ _Owner changed to @lvdlvd._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
